<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Is the atomic size larger than the underlying value type?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Note that the absence of padding does not mean that atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; objects are completely interchangeable with non-atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; objects: we might have promoted the alignment of a type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; without making it bigger.</span></CodeLine>
